Mate in two on the f7 square.
moves.8... Bg7 9. Ng5 e6 10. d5 d6 11. Qd3 cxd: Offering the e pawn. If taken, 13. Qxf7#.
moves.12... Bf6 13. Bb5+ Bc6 14. exd5: As one might speculate, I did not plan on winning this game.
moves.15. b3: Trying to get that pesky Bishop off of f6.
moves.15... Bd7 16. Bb2: Trying again, but this time with a little extra.
moves.16... e5 17. O-O Bxg5 18. Re1 f6 19. cxd: Somehow, his defense falls apart in front of me.
moves.25... Bxd6 26. Kh1 Nf6: I was hoping for mate, but now he can hide behind his horsey.
moves.27. Rg1+ Kf7 28. Ne4 Qe7 29. Ng5+ Ke8 30: Don't know how, but I won.
